about.description:
Godrej Properties is a well-known name in the real estate industry and this company is dedicated to providing cutting-edge design and technology, and every project by Godrej Properties reflects the dedication of the company towards creating sustainable living spaces. The company's guiding principle is to provide excellent residences with sustainability and innovation and this guiding principle aims to give their valuable customers access to a wealthy and sophisticated lifestyle.

Awards And Achievements

The invention, sustainability, and philosophies that are focused on excellence are some of the qualities which are brought to the real estate sector by Godrej Properties. However, each project developed by Godrej Properties reflects the dedication and trust that they have earned over the years.

Why choose Godrej Properties?

Through their Good and Green approach of shared values, they are also combining their passion and purpose to make a difference in order to increase the employability of the Indian workforce, develop a greener India, and innovate for "Good" and "Green" products.

  • Along with the bottom line, people and the environment have always been their main priorities.
  • The Godrej Group's promoter stake is owned by philanthropic trusts that support initiatives in India related to the environment, education, and healthcare for about 23% of the time.
  • Timely possession as committed to the best with affordable pricing
  • Over 250 awards and recognitions have been given to Godrej Properties recently.
  • They ought to become India's most favored real estate group and the country's fastest-growing Real Estate developer.
  • NRI supportive of investment.
  • From 24*7 hospital services close to educational institutions, public parks, metro connectivity, and many more.
  • Amenities are provided after studying the needs and requirements of the residents.
  • 5000+ happy customers nationally and internationally

know_about.description:
Godrej Woods Sector 43 Noida is an under-construction residential development being developed in the heart of Noida. It is a luxury home which is the perfect definition of 'Luxurious Dream Home'. Godrej Properties is turning dreams into reality for the residents as well as the investors. The project of Godrej Woods Sector 43 in Noida is being built on a land area of 11 acres and it is offering numerous configurations including 2 BHK, 3 BHK, 4 BHK, and 5 BHK apartments with sizes ranging from 1255 Sq. ft. - 3759 Sq. ft.

Godrej Woods Noida was launched in January 2021 and it is expected to be delivered in October 2027. This housing development has 10 towers with 34 floors in each tower and these units are given all the facilities that match the needs and requirements of home-buyers. It is a luxury home in the heart of the city with all the in-trend amenities that one can think of for their investments.

GODREJ WOODS RERA NUMBER

Godrej Woods RERA registration number is UPRERAPRJ773536, which can be checked thoroughly by the end user on the government website.

SITE LAYOUT

The luxury project of Godrej Woods Noida has the majestic 10 towers with 34 floors in each tower and these towers have all the luxury amenities that anybody can aspire to have. There are a total of 110 apartments in the residential development with the size ranging from 1255 sq. ft. to 3759 sq. ft.

Moreover, this residential enclave is landscaped with open spaces and ample recreational activities in the close vicinity of these luxury apartments. This residential development is spread over 11 acres of land area.

DETAILED FEATURES & AMENITIES

Godrej Woods Sector 43 Noida has varying facilities and amenities that promote its appeal on the Noida Expressway - like never before. Feel the luxury that defines your lifestyle in the best possible way:

  • 35,000 sq. ft. clubhouse with 5-star service
  • Two infinity-edge swimming pools
  • Modern gymnasium
  • State-of-the-art steam and sauna
  • 15-seater mini plex
  • Yoga terrace
  • Spa and wellness centre
  • Indoor games room
  • On-site restaurant
  • Barbeque area
  • Three-tier security system

SPECIFICATIONS

The key specifications of the project Godrej Woods, one of the new launch residential projects in Noida are as follows

Structure
  • RCC frame structure
Tiles and Flooring
  • Vitrified tiles are given in the living/dining,
  • Wooden flooring has been provided in all the bedrooms,
  • Anti-skid tiles are provided in the toilet, kitchen, and balcony.
Walls
  • Acrylic emulsion is used on internal walls,
  • Weatherproof paint is done on the external walls of the apartments.
Fittings
  • There is a sink attached to the counters,
  • CP fittings or equivalent are given in the Kitchen and other areas.
Doors & Windows
  • A teak wood frame is given in the main door,
  • Red meranti is used in the internal doors,
  • An aluminium frame with glass is used for windows
  • Sliding doors windows or equivalent are given in the rooms.
Bathroom Specification
  • Shower Panel is given in the bathrooms,
  • The Bath fittings are provided of premium make in the bathrooms,
  • Geyser is provided in every bathroom of the apartment.

HOME LOAN OFFER

Majorly, many listed Indian Banks like Kotak Mahindra, Axis Bank, PNB Housing, and Bank of Baroda are providing the best home loans to buyers for Godrej Woods to make the loan communication hassle-free.

DOWNLOAD BROCHURE
